metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11173 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Missing anchor in generated regex for rack-cors before 0.4.1 allows a malicious third-party site to perform CORS requests. If the configuration were intended to allow only the trusted example.com domain name and not the malicious example.net domain name, then example.com.example.net (as well as example.com-example.net) would be inadvertently allowed.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack-cors: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
